page.title: 08Life at the Fenstanton G.H.
page.content:
My name is Sheryl. My Mum gets up at about 7:30 a.m. We have {7 rooms}and space for {16 or 18 guests}. Mum does a cooked breakfast with fruit juice or cornflakes for starters. The guests also have a pot of tea and toast. For dinner we have something different every day. Guests can sit in the front room any time they like.
We have a hatch from the kitchen into the dining room. We also have a bath and shower with a toilet and two other toilets. We have our own lounge and a little shed; we use the shed as a bedroom. {My Mum sleeps on the {settee. It is Â£8 per night.}
